trans-unit.source: Represents the permissions that can be granted for file access and operations on memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以授予的文件访问和针对内存映射文件的操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class specifies the access rights for a memory-mapped file and how access attempts are audited.
trans-unit.target: MemoryMappedFileSecurity 类指定一个内存映射文件以及如何审核的访问尝试次数的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示为一组规则的访问和审核权限。

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system.
trans-unit.target: MemoryMappedFileSecurity 类是基础的 Microsoft Windows 文件安全系统的抽象。

trans-unit.source: It hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: 它会隐藏许多 Dacl 和 Sacl 的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the MemoryMappedFileSecurity class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a pipe.
trans-unit.target: MemoryMappedFileSecurity 类用于检索、 添加或更改表示 DACL 和 SACL 的管道的访问规则。

trans-unit.source: To apply new or changed access or audit rules to a memory-mapped file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要应用新的或更改访问或审核到内存映射文件的规则，请使用<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索访问权限或审核从现有的文件的规则，请使用<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> methods take a MemoryMappedFileSecurity object as a parameter: - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>方法采用 MemoryMappedFileSecurity 对象作为参数:- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29></xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"></xref> class.
